events.message: We have received the application from John Doe for the Software Engineer position in our backend development team.
The candidate's profile was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster due to strong software development experience.
Recruiter Sarah Johnson has been assigned to manage the hiring process for the software developer role John applied for.
Conducted an initial phone screening with the candidate to discuss his software development skills and past projects.
The candidate responded positively to the initial screening feedback and expressed eagerness to proceed to the technical interview.
Scheduled a technical interview for John on May 10th to assess his coding skills and problem-solving abilities in software engineering.
